content.raw_text: From: STARZ <support@starz.com> To: Jonathan Park <jon.park@example.com> Subject: Welcome to STARZ – Account STZ-910022 Date: Mon, 23 Jun 2025 08:05:13 +0000 Message-ID: <WLC-910022@starz.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8 Hi Jonathan, Your STARZ streaming subscription is now active. • Plan: Monthly – Ad-Free HD • Account ID: STZ-910022 • First charge: US $9.99 (Visa •••• 4831) on 23 Jul 2025 Download the STARZ app and dive into exclusive originals. Happy streaming, The STARZ Team

From: STARZ <billing@starz.com> To: Priyanka Singh <priyanka.singh@example.in> Subject: Payment received – STZ-771134 Date: Mon, 23 Jun 2025 13:37:48 +0530 Message-ID: <PAY-771134-20250623@starz.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8 Dear Priyanka, Thank you for your monthly payment of ₹299.00 for STARZ Premium HD. • Account ID: STZ-771134 • Coverage: 23 Jun – 22 Jul 2025 • Card ending: 7160 Enjoy the latest Bollywood hits now streaming. Cheers, STARZ Billing

From: STARZ <renewals@starz.com> To: Miguel Hernández <miguel.hdz@example.es> Subject: Your annual plan renews soon (STZ-588902) Date: Mon, 23 Jun 2025 10:22:06 +0200 Message-ID: <REN-588902@starz.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8 Hola Miguel, Your STARZ Annual UHD plan renews on 01 Jul 2025. • Account ID: STZ-588902 • Upcoming charge: €79.99 (Mastercard •••• 2044) • Renewal term: 01 Jul 2025 – 30 Jun 2026 No action needed—your access continues seamlessly. Saludos, STARZ Renewals

From: STARZ <support@starz.com> To: Nneka Okafor <nneka.okafor@example.ng> Subject: Action required: card declined for STZ-640311 Date: Mon, 23 Jun 2025 09:58:21 +0100 Message-ID: <DECL-640311@starz.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8 Hi Nneka, We couldn’t process the ₦2,900.00 renewal for your Monthly HD plan (card ending 5519). Please update your payment method by 26 Jun 2025 to avoid any interruption: https://starz.com/account/640311/billing Thanks, STARZ Billing Support

From: STARZ <offers@starz.com> To: Lars Andersen <lars.andersen@example.dk> Subject: Upgrade to 4K + Dolby Atmos for 20 kr./month Date: Mon, 23 Jun 2025 12:14:33 +0200 Message-ID: <UPG-DK-994120@starz.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8 Hej Lars, As a loyal subscriber (STZ-994120) you can unlock 4K + Dolby Atmos for just 20 kr. extra each month. Upgrade now: https://starz.com/upgrade/994120 Venlig hilsen, STARZ Danmark

From: STARZ <invoices@starz.com> To: Jiao Li <jiao.li@example.cn> Subject: Your receipt – STZ-442017 Date: Tue, 24 Jun 2025 20:03:55 +0800 Message-ID: <INV-442017@starz.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8 李娇您好， 附件为您的增值税发票。 • 账号 ID: STZ-442017 • 计划: 月度4K会员 • 金额: ¥48.00 • 付款方式: 银联卡 •••• 6372 • 日期: 2025-06-24 如有问题，请联系 cn-billing@starz.com 谢谢， STARZ

From: STARZ <welcome@starz.com> To: Chloe Martin <chloe.martin@example.fr> Subject: Free trial started – STZ-733501 Date: Tue, 24 Jun 2025 14:41:08 +0200 Message-ID: <TRIAL-733501@starz.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8 Bonjour Chloé, Profitez de STARZ gratuitement jusqu’au 23 juillet 2025. • ID compte : STZ-733501 • Carte débit enregistrée : Visa •••• 0823 (aucun débit aujourd’hui) Nous vous enverrons un rappel trois jours avant la facturation de 6,99 €. Bon visionnage ! L’équipe STARZ

From: STARZ <support@starz.com> To: Zachary Wilson <zach.wilson@example.us> Subject: Password reset confirmation (STZ-218640) Date: Tue, 24 Jun 2025 06:12:29 -0400 Message-ID: <PWD-218640@starz.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8 Hi Zachary, Your password was reset on 24 Jun 2025 at 06:11 EDT for account STZ-218640. If you didn’t initiate this, visit https://starz.com/security right away. Stay safe, STARZ Security

From: STARZ <billing@starz.com> To: Yasmin Ali <yasmin.ali@example.ae> Subject: Refund processed – STZ-505566 Date: Tue, 24 Jun 2025 19:27:18 +0400 Message-ID: <REF-505566@starz.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8 Dear Yasmin, We have refunded AED 27.30 to your Mastercard •••• 9012 for the cancelled add-on. • Account ID: STZ-505566 • Refund date: 24 Jun 2025 • Reference: UAE-2025-1114 Allow up to seven business days for the credit to appear. Best regards, STARZ

From: STARZ <notifications@starz.com> To: Luca Bianchi <luca.bianchi@example.it> Subject: New episode alert – “Outlander” S07E05 now streaming Date: Tue, 24 Jun 2025 10:09:44 +0200 Message-ID: <EP-ALERT-980155@starz.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8 Ciao Luca, La nuova puntata di “Outlander” è ora disponibile in 4K. Guarda ora: https://starz.com/watch/980155 Buona visione, STARZ Italia

From: STARZ <subscriptions@starz.com> To: Helena Novak <helena.novak@example.cz> Subject: Subscription cancelled as requested – STZ-661099 Date: Tue, 24 Jun 2025 11:52:37 +0200 Message-ID: <CAN-661099@starz.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8 Dobrý den, Heleno, Vaše předplatné bylo zrušeno s účinností 24. 6. 2025. Přístup zůstane aktivní do 15. 7. 2025. • ID účtu: STZ-661099 • Tarif: Měsíční Full HD • Vrácená částka: 179 Kč na kartu •••• 4498 Děkujeme, Tým STARZ

From: STARZ <offers@starz.com> To: Hans Meier <h.meier@example.de> Subject: 3 Monate STARZ für nur 5 € Date: Wed, 25 Jun 2025 07:11:03 +0200 Message-ID: <SALE-DE-880412@starz.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8 Hallo Hans, Sichere dir drei Monate STARZ für einmalig 5 €. Angebot endet am 30. Juni 2025. Jetzt einlösen: https://starz.com/de/5euro Viel Spaß beim Streamen! STARZ Deutschland

From: STARZ <billing@starz.com> To: Sofia Rodríguez <sofia.rodriguez@example.ar> Subject: Currency switch notice – STZ-554700 Date: Wed, 25 Jun 2025 04:45:27 -0300 Message-ID: <CUR-AR-554700@starz.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8 Hola Sofía, A partir del 1 de agosto de 2025 te facturaremos en pesos argentinos (ARS 2.299/mes) en lugar de USD. Preguntas: latam-billing@starz.com ¡Gracias por elegirnos! STARZ

From: STARZ <notifications@starz.com> To: Marcus Green <marcus.green@example.co.uk> Subject: Your watchlist pick “Power Book V” arrives Friday Date: Wed, 25 Jun 2025 06:28:10 +0100 Message-ID: <WL-ALERT-432221@starz.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8 Hi Marcus, Great news—season 1 of “Power Book V” drops 27 Jun 2025. We’ll remind you the moment it’s live. STARZ UK

From: STARZ <support@starz.com> To: Aleksandar Petrović <aleksandar.petrovic@example.rs> Subject: Address change confirmed (STZ-307844) Date: Wed, 25 Jun 2025 09:40:02 +0200 Message-ID: <ADDR-307844@starz.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8 Zdravo Aleksandre, Your billing address for account STZ-307844 has been updated to Bulevar kralja Aleksandra 42, Beograd 11000, Srbija. Hvala što koristite STARZ!

From: STARZ <analytics@starz.com> To: Claire Dubois <claire.dubois@example.be> Subject: Your viewing stats – May 2025 (STZ-889301) Date: Wed, 25 Jun 2025 08:22:51 +0200 Message-ID: <STATS-889301-202505@starz.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8 Bonjour Claire, En mai, vous avez regardé 27 épisodes et 4 films (12 heures au total). Genre préféré : Drame (9 titres). Bonne séance, STARZ Insights

From: STARZ <enterprise@starz.com> To: Ravi Kumar <ravi.kumar@example.com> Subject: Corporate access activated – Org ID 70217 Date: Wed, 25 Jun 2025 12:58:44 +0000 Message-ID: <CORP-70217@starz.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8 Hi Ravi, Your company, FutureMedia Ltd., has added you to its STARZ Business licence. • Org ID: 70217 • User: ravi.kumar@example.com • Access: Premium Streaming Library Set your password: https://starz.com/corp/70217/setup Welcome aboard! STARZ Enterprise

From: STARZ <security@starz.com> To: Min-seo Kim <minseo.kim@example.kr> Subject: Two-step verification enabled – STZ-441210 Date: Wed, 25 Jun 2025 18:13:09 +0900 Message-ID: <2SV-441210@starz.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8 안녕하세요, Min-seo 님, 2단계 인증이 활성화되었습니다. • 계정 ID: STZ-441210 • 백업 코드가 첨부되어 있습니다. 안전한 곳에 보관하세요. 감사합니다, STARZ 보안팀

From: STARZ <support@starz.com> To: Oliver Johansson <oliver.johansson@example.se> Subject: Streaming quality issue resolved (STZ-322599) Date: Wed, 25 Jun 2025 10:33:17 +0200 Message-ID: <FIX-322599@starz.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8 Hej Oliver, We’ve fixed the buffering problem affecting Nordic servers. Please try again and let us know if issues persist. Tack, STARZ Support

From: STARZ <donotreply@starz.com> To: Isabella Johnson <isabella.j@example.ca> Subject: Trial ending soon – add payment to continue Date: Wed, 25 Jun 2025 04:12:07 -0400 Message-ID: <TRIAL-END-630155@starz.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8 Hi Isabella, Your free trial (STZ-630155) ends on 28 Jun 2025. Add a payment method to keep watching for CA $11.99/month. Add card: https://starz.com/billing/630155

From: STARZ <billing@starz.com> To: Adel Khaled <adel.khaled@example.eg> Subject: VAT receipt – STZ-772003 Date: Wed, 25 Jun 2025 11:07:46 +0200 Message-ID: <VAT-EG-772003@starz.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8 عزيزي عادل، هذه فاتورة ضريبة القيمة المضافة الخاصة بك. • معرف الحساب: STZ-772003 • الخطة: شهري HD • المبلغ: ‎ج.م‏ 119.00 (شامل 14% ضريبة) • التاريخ: 25 يونيو 2025 • رقم التسجيل الضريبي: 310-864-453 مع تحيات، STARZ

From: STARZ <offers@starz.com> To: Sofia Petrova <sofia.petrova@example.bg> Subject: Invite a friend, earn a free month Date: Thu, 26 Jun 2025 09:51:42 +0300 Message-ID: <REF-INV-210045@starz.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8 Здравей, София, Сподели линка https://starz.com/r/210045 – при регистрация на приятел получавате безплатен месец и двамата. Приятно гледане! STARZ

From: STARZ <notifications@starz.com> To: Emma Brown <emma.brown@example.co.nz> Subject: New Zealand library update – 12 titles added Date: Thu, 26 Jun 2025 19:04:16 +1200 Message-ID: <NZ-LIB-ADD-712230@starz.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8 Kia ora Emma, We’ve added 12 new movies to the NZ catalogue, including “Knives Out” and “La La Land.” Browse now: https://starz.com/nz/new Ngā mihi, STARZ Aotearoa

From: STARZ <billing@starz.com> To: Fatima Zahra <fatima.zahra@example.ma> Subject: Payment method updated – STZ-990421 Date: Thu, 26 Jun 2025 15:22:58 +0100 Message-ID: <PAYUPD-990421@starz.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8 سلام فاطمة الزهراء، تم تعيين بطاقة Visa الجديدة المنتهية بـ 4417 كطريقة الدفع الافتراضية لحسابك STZ-990421. • الرسوم القادمة: 01 سبتمبر 2025 – MAD 88.00 شكراً لاختيارك STARZ!

From: STARZ <reminders@starz.com> To: Gabriel Costa <gabriel.costa@example.br> Subject: Your subscription is expiring – act before 05 Jul 2025 Date: Thu, 26 Jun 2025 07:46:25 -0300 Message-ID: <EXP-811204@starz.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8 Olá Gabriel, Sua assinatura promocional (STZ-811204) termina em breve. Renove por R$14,90/mês para continuar assistindo. Renovar agora: https://starz.com/renovar/811204
